title: old houses and schools
name: old houses and schools
description:
A Map by Nodeepthinking

places I've lived and the places I was sent to school... current to the next-to-last place I live, because there needs to be some mystery in life.

properties.name: Camarillo
properties.description: Posted by NodeepthinkingcamarilloAfter a couple of months in a rented condo, we moved to Camarillo -- after living in Holland, a single level ranch house with a pool in the back yard seemed very exotic. It was so warm on the first X-mas day we spend there from Santa Ana winds that we went in the pool...

properties.name: Grad School at Brown
properties.description: Posted by Nodeepthinking angell and thayer, providence RII learned many life lessons and even met my beloved here, but didn\'t quite manage to get anywhere with the old PhD

properties.name: High School
properties.description: Posted by Nodeepthinking ojai CA

properties.name: Llay
properties.description: Posted by NodeepthinkingwrexhamWales. Land of sheep -- across the street. Between escaping sheep and horses from the farm across the way, Jones the Turf was kept busy. Started primary / elementary school here for a few months. In the meantime, the company my dad worked for was bought by an American firm. They had him travelling to Holland a great deal until eventually offering him a position there... a 6 month stint that turned into 6 years.

properties.name: Middle School
properties.description: Posted by Nodeepthinking My brother and I were sent here because the local public school refused to place us based on where we had been in the British School in Holland, but rather based on age... which would have amounted to losing a year.

properties.name: Port Hueneme
properties.description: Posted by Nodeepthinkingport huenemeThe first place we lived in California was a rented condo in Port Hueneme (pronounced why-nee-mee). This brought introduction to the delights of naugahyde-covered couches, HBO (I lost track of how many times we watched the Cannonball Run), and night-time baseball games -- simpler to understand than (American) football...

properties.name: The first move south...
properties.description: Posted by Nodeepthinkingmelbourn englandAfter a brief stay somewhere nearby we moved into a house in Melbourn, Hertfordshire -- I was about 14 months old. My dad had found a job south of the border; we were here until my mother spotted an advert for a new job that he had missed, which took us to Wales (and eventually, California...)

properties.name: The move to DC (more or less)
properties.description: Posted by NodeepthinkingRiver and Little Falls Parkway, Bethesda MDFirst apartment here.

properties.name: University of Southern California
properties.description: Posted by Nodeepthinkingexposition and figueroa, los angeles CAWherein I enjoyed beer, college football, many concerts, and the like.

properties.name: Where it all started
properties.description: Posted by Nodeepthinkingdrip road stirling scotlandI arrived on the scene here, right before Christmas, late as usual. Since the NHS didn\'t throw new mothers out immediately in those days, my mother missed Hogmanay or New Year\'s Eve for the rest of you. My father had surprise visitors who stayed until something like 6 a.m.; he fell asleep on his good ear and didn\'t hear the phone with the "come and get me" call for some time... Colour the new mother displeased.

properties.name: somewhere near the current abode
properties.description: Posted by Nodeepthinkingconnecticut and mckinley, washington dc
